custom-attributes.custom-attribute:
Purchase an Online Gift Certificate

  • Delivered by email within hours
  • Send as email
  • Use online only
  • Only redeemable in the country where purchased

Online Gift Certificate General Information

Online Gift Certificates can be ordered in any amount between $5.00 and $5000.00. They are sent via email to any individual with a valid email address. The recipient of an online gift certificate will receive an email with a gift certificate code redeemable only at Salesforce. The code is activated within 24 hours after receiving the email.
